text: Melaenae or Melainai () was an ancient town on the island of Thera. It is mentioned in ancient inscriptions.IG XII,3 330 (lines 33, 73). Its site is unlocated. ==References== Category:Populated places in the ancient Aegean islands Category:Former populated places in Greece Category:Ancient Thera Category:Lost ancient cities and towns
title: Melaenae (Thera)
